front.title: TLS Elliptic Curve Cipher Suites with SHA-256/384 and AES Galois Counter Mode

abstract.t: RFC 4492 describes elliptic curve cipher suites for Transport Layer Security (TLS). However, all those cipher suites use SHA-1 as their MAC algorithm. This document describes eight new CipherSuites for TLS/DTLS which specify stronger digest algorithms. Four use HMAC with SHA-256 or SHA-384 and four use AES in Galois Counter Mode (GCM).
